alert.note: Alert for Smyth; Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A LINE OF STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN SMYTH AND SOUTHWESTERN TAZEWELL COUNTIES... At 409 PM EDT, radar indicated strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Claypool Hill to near Allison Gap to near Saltville. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. Winds in excess of 40 mph are possible with these storms. Brief heavy rainfall and occasional cloud-to-ground lightning can also be expected with this activity. Locations impacted include... Saltville... Chilhowie... Adwolf... Hungry Mother State Park... Broadford... Quarry... and Allison Gap. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
